Anomalous login activity to cloud servic.Data: Zeek conn.log, Zeek http.log, Windows Event ID 4624, Windows Event ID 4625
Anomalous login activity to cloud servic.Action: Analyze Zeek http.log and conn.log for connections to known cloud authentication endpoints (e.g., login.microsoftonline.com, accounts.google.com, etc.). Identify source IPs, user agents (potentially indicating CLI use), and connection timing. Use time series analysis to detect unusual spikes in connection frequency or connections outside typical business hours. Correlate with successful local logins (Windows Event ID 4624) on internal hosts.

Use of application access tokens or clou.Action: Analyze Zeek http.log and conn.log for connections to known cloud API endpoints (e.g., graph.microsoft.com, compute.googleapis.com, etc.). Monitor for connection volume, source IPs, user agents, and requested URLs/paths. Apply correlation analysis to link API activity to suspicious internal hosts or user accounts identified through other alerts.
